org.graphstream.ui.geom
Class Box2

java.lang.Object
  org.graphstream.ui.geom.Box2
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Box2
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

2D box.

A Box2 is a rectangle characterised by two 2D points.

Since:
20001121
Version:
0.1
Author:
Antoine Dutot
See Also:

unionOf

public void unionOf(Box2 a,
                    Box2 b)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Set geometry as the union of a and b. This always works, even if a and b have no common part.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

intersectionOf

public void intersectionOf(Box2 a,
                           Box2 b)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Set geometry as the intersection of a and b. If this intersection is empty, one or all components of p1 will be greater than the corresponding components of p2.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

intersectionWith

public void intersectionWith(Box2 other)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Set geometry as the intersection of this and other. If this intersection is empty, one or all components of p1 will be greater than the corresponding components of p2.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
